thread.title: Eric Bailly hopes key Man United target joins him at Old Trafford… even if it means this
thread.title_full: Eric Bailly hopes key Man United target joins him at Old Trafford… even if it means this

title: Eric Bailly hopes key Man United target joins him at Old Trafford… even if it means this
text: Eric Bailly hopes key Man United target joins him at Old Trafford… even if it means this ERIC BAILLY would welcome Victor Lindelof to Manchester United with open arms - even if it costs him his own place. By Jack Staplehurst PUBLISHED: PUBLISHED: 03:30, Mon, Jan 9, 2017 Benfica’s centre-half is a key target for Jose Mourinho , and Express Sport understands a January move is back on. A £38million deal is close to being agreed for 22-year-old Lindelof, with the United boss keen to strengthen his defence. Bailly himself was only signed during the summer by Mourinho for £30m from Villarreal. GETTY Victor Lindelof and Eric Bailly could form a formidable defensive partnership at Manchester United I hope to play with [Lindelof] - hopefully he will help us Eric Bailly But the Ivory Coast international’s departure to the Africa Cup of Nations this month and Marcos Rojo’s recent injury means reinforcements are being sought. And Bailly, 22, is excited about the prospect of playing alongside the Sweden international at Old Trafford. "I hope to play with him - hopefully he will help us," Bailly told Fotbollskanalen after Ivory Coast’s 2-1 win over Sweden in Abu Dhabi on Sunday. "He is a very good player. He has great qualities and will certainly do well if he comes to us. GETTY Eric Bailly has begun preparations with Ivory Coast for the Africa Cup of Nations How Manchester United could look with Victor Lindelof Wed, December 28, 2016
